means: <德>鲁格尔（德国造半自动手枪的商标名） (luger )鲁格尔手枪

sentence.Network_en: You have reached the desk of Sergeant Wes Luger.
sentence.Network_cn: 你已经到了警官费斯鲁格尔的办公室.

sentence.Network_en: However the Luger was approved by the German Army, and saw service in WWI and WWII.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而,鲁格批准了德国陆军, 并认为服务第一次世界大战和第二次世界大战.

auth_sentence.content: I said to him, 'What caliber is your Luger?
auth_sentence.res_content: I said to him, 'What caliber is your Luger?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I said to him, 'What caliber is your Luger?

auth_sentence.content: Police believe a semi-automatic Luger was used by the killer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Police believe a semi-automatic Luger was used by the killer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Police believe a semi-automatic Luger was used by the killer.

auth_sentence.content: " Crowe snapped back, "If you ever touch anything on my desk again, I'll bring in my Luger!
auth_sentence.res_content: " Crowe snapped back, "If you ever touch anything on my desk again, I'll bring in my Luger!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: " Crowe snapped back, "If you ever touch anything on my desk again, I'll bring in my Luger!
